title: 3 Breakfast Pizza Recipes You’ve Been Searching For
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Who says pizza is only for lunch or dinner? Breakfast pizzas are a guilt-free way to start your day. With a crispy crust, savory toppings, and the star of the show — eggs — these breakfast pizzas are sure to awaken your taste buds and fuel you for the day ahead.

1. Breakfast Pizza

This recipe takes the beloved elements of a hearty breakfast and transforms them into a delicious pizza. The crust is topped with scrambled eggs, crispy bacon or sausage, and a generous layer of shredded cheese. You can customize it further by adding your favorite breakfast ingredients, such as diced ham, sautéed vegetables, or even a sprinkle of hot sauce. Bake it to perfection, and you'll have a breakfast pizza that's both satisfying and incredibly flavorful.

View the full recipe.

2. Eggs Benedict Breakfast Pizza

If you're a fan of Eggs Benedict, you'll love this creative twist on the classic breakfast favorite. The Eggs Benedict Breakfast Pizza combines the flavors of a traditional Eggs Benedict with the crispiness of a pizza crust. The base is typically a hollandaise sauce spread over the crust, followed by toppings like Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and a sprinkle of chives. The result is a creamy, savory, and slightly tangy pizza that's perfect for breakfast or brunch.

View the full recipe.

3. Egg Breakfast Pizza

For those who prefer a simpler approach, the Egg Breakfast Pizza is a delightful option. It features a golden, sunny-side-up egg as the center of the pizza, nestled on a bed of cheese and toppings. You can get creative with the toppings by adding cooked vegetables, crispy bacon or sausage, and a sprinkle of herbs or spices. The beauty of this recipe lies in its simplicity and the richness of the perfectly cooked egg that adds a lusciousness to every bite.

View the full recipe.

Breakfast pizzas featuring eggs are a fantastic way to start your day with a burst of flavor and a dose of protein. Whether you opt for the classic Breakfast Pizza, the indulgent Eggs Benedict Breakfast Pizza, or the simple yet satisfying Egg Breakfast Pizza, you're in for a delightful breakfast experience.

So, why settle for a boring breakfast when you can enjoy a slice of pizza packed with all your favorite breakfast ingredients? Try these breakfast pizzas (with Chino Valley Ranchers eggs) and elevate your mornings to a whole new level of flavor!
